name: Legend of Ball
description:
Legend of Ball is a dungeon crawler baller where a young child chases their ball to the pits of darkness which they now must escape or parish.

Throw ball to destroy enemies

Throw ball to solve puzzles

Throw ball to activate switches

Throw ball to rule them all


Controls:
Arrows keys: Move and Aim

X-:Hold to charge and release to throw ball. Keep arrow keys held down towards the direction you want to throw.

Number keys 1-5: Change the color palette

Made during Game Boy Jam 5

Controls:
Arrow Keys: Move
X: Throw ball
1-5: Change Palette

A game by Cowboy Color

Art @britt_t_brady

Programming @CullenDDwyer
